hero.subtitle: Speak and see instant translations on your screen. Real-time voice continuous translation keeps long conversations flowing seamlessly. Chat logs are saved so you can reconnect anytime.

problem.label: The Problem
problem.description: You meet an amazing person at a party, but translating one sentence at a time breaks the flow of conversation, leaving only awkward silence.

list.item1: Conversation flow breaks while translating sentence by sentence
list.item2: Can't tell who said what in group conversations of 3+ people
list.item3: No way to stay in touch after parting

chat.msg1: "Hey, I really enjoyed talking with you tonight!"

features.label: Features
features.title: Seamless translation, and beyond
features.subtitle: Mingle is not just a translation app. It has everything you need for real communication.

realtime.title: Real-time Translation
realtime.desc: Translation starts as you speak. Natural conversation without interruption.

continuous.title: Continuous Translation
continuous.desc: Long conversations are no problem. Translation continues while your partner speaks.

autoDetect.title: Multi-language Detection
autoDetect.desc: Auto-detects any language. Supports 3+ people speaking different languages simultaneously.

speaker.title: Speaker Separation
speaker.desc: AI voice recognition distinguishes each person's voice and separates the conversation by speaker. Works with 3+ people.

coreValue.label: Core Value
coreValue.title: Continue your offline conversation as a chat room
coreValue.desc1: This is the true value of Mingle.
coreValue.desc2: Invite the person you met in real life to your app. Your translated conversation becomes a permanent chat room. Continue talking the next day, next week, or anytime.
coreValue.desc3: The moment a chance meeting at a party becomes a real friendship, that's

coreValue.chatMsg2: "It was great meeting you! Let's definitely meet again when you come to Seoul."

step1.title: Start Conversation
step1.desc: Just open the app and press record. No language settings needed.

step2.title: Real-time Translation
step2.desc: Conversations are automatically recognized and translated in real-time.

step3.title: Invite Friends
step3.desc: Invite friends to the chat log and stay connected anytime.

cta.subtitle: With Mingle, you can have deep conversations with anyone, no matter what language they speak.
